name: Forest Roamer
description:
A short prototype of Forest Roamer. Procedually generated chunks spreading left and right. Fun and quick mechanics, from charging arrows in bullet time, to arrow jumping, where you boost yourself off of your own arrows!

Solo project in 6 weeks by me.

Controls:

A-D: moving

MOUSE: aiming and shooting. Charge by holding LEFT MOUSE-BUTTON

LEFT-SHIFT: Dash

O: Toggle Bullet time when aiming
